# UITabBar.ItemPositioning.centered

**Case**

Center items in the available space.

## Declaration

```swift
case centered
```

## Discussion

With this option, the tab bar uses the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar/itemWidth] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar/itemSpacing] properties to set the width of items and the spacing between items, positioning those items in the center of the available space. When the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar/ItemPositioning-swift.enum/automatic] option is selected, the tab bar uses this behavior in horizontally regular environments.

## Constants

- **UITabBar.ItemPositioning.automatic**: Specifies automatic tab bar item positioning according to the user interface idiom, as follows:
- **UITabBar.ItemPositioning.fill**: Distribute items across the entire width of the tab bar.
